message.raw:
update stereo camera sensor to populate the z buffer.  update DepthMap.vert per http://www.opengl.org/resources/faq/technical/depthbuffer.htm where (w_c = -z_e).
Added OgreCamera::RenderDepthData() and a flag simulateDepthData.

Incorporated Rorry's contributions.  Thanks!

for more details, please see ticket

https://code.ros.org/trac/ros-pkg/ticket/4795
